title: Pixel 5 battery , not 2 days .
content:
Anybody else own a pixel 5 and wondering how it's advertised to have a 2 day battery .
Juice for days ?
This battery is just average ,adaptive battery makes no difference at all .
It's 8 to 8 n half sot a day .
The only way people will get 2 days is if they hardly use it !!
